arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford issues five-word message after Man United's victory over Fulham - as Ruben Amorim says he'd rather play his goalkeeper coach
arts.sum: Lisandro Martinez's strike secured a slender 1-0 victory for Amorim's side on a night when strikers Rasmus Hojlund and Joshua Zirkzee again failed to make an impact.

arts.ttl: Sir Jim Ratcliffe hounded by irate Man United fans as 'worse than the Glazers' in X-rated rants with anger at owner for ongoing ticket-price hikes after Fulham win
arts.sum: Sir Jim Ratcliffe was hounded by his own fans as he left Craven Cottage on Sunday night with the Man United minority owner continuing to persevere over his controversial ticket-price hike.

arts.ttl: Fulham assessing Wilson injury after loss to United
arts.sum: Fulham will assess an ankle injury Harry Wilson suffered during their 1-0 loss to Manchester United. Wilson had to be taken off early in the second half of the game at Craven Cottage, where Lisandro Martinez’s fortuitous 78th-minute goal gave United victory. “He twisted his ankle,” said Whites boss Marco Silva. “We have to assess […] The post Fulham assessing Wilson injury after loss to United appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Every word from Ruben Amorim press conference after Fulham v Man Utd
arts.sum: We need guys with the one-v-one [ability], but like I say I don’t know what’s going to happen until the end of the window." "The reason is the training, the way I see what a footballer should do in training, in life and it’s every day, every detail.

arts.ttl: Fulham defeat by ‘very lucky’ Man Utd is ‘unfair’, says Silva
arts.sum: Marco Silva described Fulham’s defeat as “unfair” after Lisandro Martinez’s fortuitous goal gave Manchester United a 1-0 victory at Craven Cottage. Martinez’s shot struck Fulham midfielder Sasa Lukic and looped over keeper Bernd Leno. It came in the 78th minute and was United’s first effort on target. The home side were on top for much […] The post Fulham defeat by ‘very lucky’ Man Utd is ‘unfair’, says Silva appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim reacts to Fulham 0 Man Utd 1 in Premier League 26 January 2025
arts.sum: We tried to control the game, tried to play our game, but we need to improve a lot and you can feel it. "It’s really important because clearly you are closer to winning games and it gives you confidence.

arts.ttl: Lisandro Martinez and Adama Traore beef ignites again as pair clash in meaty challenge and tempers flare in shoving match after old social media war of words
arts.sum: Lisandro Martinez and Adama Traore continued their personal rivalry as the pair clashed during Man United's 1-0 victory over Fulham on Sunday evening.

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford future: Ruben Amorim issues damning verdict on Red Devils forward after win at Fulham
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim explains why Marcus Rashford is still being overlooked following Sunday's 1-0 win over Fulham.

arts.ttl: 'Tough' defeat as Fulham 'better' than Man Utd - Silva
arts.sum: Fulham manager Marco Silva says his side were "better than" Manchester United in a "tough" 1-0 Premier League defeat at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: Lisandro Martinez snatches win for Manchester United at Fulham
arts.sum: United moved up to 12th in the table.
